definition: to write freely/to express oneself as one pleases
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: After learning how to write just my name, I would doodle.
sentences.chinese: 在学会了写自己的名字之后，我总是信笔涂鸦。

sentences.english: When I am in such a mood, Please leave me along and let me write as the pen dictates .
sentences.chinese: 或是处于这样的心境时，请别管我，请让我信笔驰骋。

definition: to finish (a letter, a painting) at a stroke
to put pen to paper/pen mark
vigor of strokes in calligraphy or drawing/vigor of style in literary composition
to take up one's pen/to start to write
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
to dip the pen into ink/to write
to write a flawless essay in one go (idiom)/to be quick-witted and skilled at writing compositions
